yaar ye Hash ka kyaa chakkar hai... saala whenever somebody is in trouble with seeding, he/she mentions 'Hash' ; iis Hash kaa karnaa kyaa hai ye to koi bataao bhai...

thodi tips dena... main to alag tarike se seed kar rahaa hoon... agar iis Hash se seed karne mein aasaani rehti hai to hamein bhi sikhaa do bandhu...
